pullRequest.title: Add session property for targetResultSize
pullRequest.bodyText:
Setting the target_result_size session property will add the specified
targetResultSize as a parameter to the nextUri in a statement.
The default value for targetResultSize is 1MB.  It is useful to override this value in certain cases; for example, for scenarios which have limited bandwidth available, setting a larger value would mean larger payloads are streamed directly from the coordinator to the client before further requests for data are made, reducing wall time.
== RELEASE NOTES ==

General Changes
* Add ``target_result_size`` session property to customize data batch sizes being streamed from coordinator
